title: ennai AtkoLLum
sahitya:
ennai AtkoLLum eNNamEn unakku innum udikkavillai cenni malai mannavA


anupallavi

  unnaittAn endan uru tuNai enru nAn eNNI vandEninnum eNNi varuginrEn


caraNam    anbar anaivarukkum inruvarai enrumE tunbam tIra parindu tuNai purindiDuvOnE
annAril oruvan aDiyEnum allavO enpAl iniyEnum unnuLLam urugAdO
